game.name: Failed Game Developer
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 스테레오 사운드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You gave up everything to become a Game Developer. Now a failure, a reject of society, try to get your life back to the way it was. Rise from the ashes like a Phoenix in the hope that one day you will have a normal life again.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You gave up everything to become a Game Developer. Now a failure, a reject of society, try to get your life back to the way it was. Rise from the ashes like a Phoenix in the hope that one day you will have a normal life again.
